name: asd-nav
description: Navigation component that reads routes from React Router to render a nested html-list of links.
author: Andreas Fridlund <afridlund85@gmail.com>

scripts.build-ex: browserify examples/es5/src/app.jsx -o examples/es5/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build-ex2: browserify examples/vanilla/src/app.jsx -o examples/vanilla/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build-ex3: browserify examples/bootstrap/src/app.jsx -o examples/bootstrap/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
